mapper.select: SELECT id, parent_id, menu_code, name, module, node_type, sort_order, created_at::timestamp as created_at FROM menu ORDER BY sort_order, id
SELECT id, parent_id, menu_code, name, module, node_type, sort_order, created_at::timestamp as created_at FROM menu WHERE parent_id = #{parentId} ORDER BY sort_order, id
SELECT id, parent_id, menu_code, name, module, node_type, sort_order, created_at::timestamp as created_at FROM menu WHERE module = #{module} ORDER BY sort_order, id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO menu (parent_id, menu_code, name, module, node_type, sort_order, created_at) VALUES (#{parentId}, #{menuCode}, #{name}, #{module}, #{nodeType}, #{sortOrder}, #{createdAt})
mapper.update: UPDATE menu SET parent_id = #{parentId}, menu_code = #{menuCode}, name = #{name}, module = #{module}, node_type = #{nodeType}, sort_order = #{sortOrder} WHERE id = #{id}
